title: Maniac Mansion Pack
description:
This is a pack of mostly all versions of Maniac Mansion.

This pack don&#039;t require any extra installation... so you can play directly except for Maniac Mansion Deluxe which require installation.

The DOS version fully work in DosBox 0.72. http://www.dosbox.com/download.php?main=1

The "SOLVE" folder is where you will find one of somes possibles solutions, try to finish the game without it.

Games (~7mb, UNPACKED!):

  - Maniac Mansion Deluxe   - The most recent version of the game with new graphics! Work under Windows.
  - Maniac Mansion DOS      - DOS version, work under DosBox.
  - Maniac Mansion Atari ST - Atari ST version, work under STEEM.
  - Maniac Mansion NES      - Nintendo NES (Famicom) version, there is two roms, the original and a prototype version. (which contain removed graphics etc.)
  - Maniac Mansion AppleII  - Apple 2 version.
  
Please report any mistakes.

Have fun!
